original_text: Then the two disciples left and they went into the city. They found everything as Jesus had told them. So they prepared the Passover meal there.
korean_text: 제자들이 나가 성내로 들어가서 예수께서 하시던 말씀대로 만나 유월절 음식을 준비하니라

sentences.original_text: and they went into the city
So they prepared the Passover meal there
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그곳에서 유월절 식사를 준비했습니다
